name: Killing Shapes
description:
This was a little practice exercise in how much of Unity I can use and see what I can do with it. Ultimately, this was the first "game" I have ever made, and it is fairly simplistic. 

Controls: 

Mouse 1 (left mouse): Eliminate/Kill Circle

Mouse 2 (right mouse): Eliminate/Kill Square

Mouse 3:(middle mouse):  Eliminate/Kill Triangle

Try to eliminate as many shapes as you want and have fun!

Updates and Changelog are pending.
